bossDialog: (Pacing back and forth, the Manticore whips its stinger tail around and shakes its mane in an attempt at intimidation. Unfazed, you begin the assault.)
(The Manticore was already alert when you entered, having smelled a human. You wonder what kind of evil could create such a beast as you order your creatures to kill it.)
(Your blood runs cold as the Manticore meets your gaze and bares its fangs. It's a good thing your creatures are here to protect you.)

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures take 15% less damage from attacks from {CLASS_Chaos} creatures.
cardBonuses.5: Your creatures take 15% less damage from attacks from {CLASS_Chaos} creatures.
cardBonuses.8: Your creatures take 15% less damage from attacks from {CLASS_Chaos} creatures.

master.dialog: Manticores excel at turning a good defense into a brilliant offense. They're a sturdy race that can take some hits while also packing a serious punch, making them all-around great combatants. Let me show you in a duel!
master.name: Reyson

name: Manticore
